snippet: WEINSTEIN--Sidney Moses. Age 99, chemist and Jewish community leader, passed away Monday, July 18, at his home in Brookline, MA formerly of West Orange, NJ. Services by Levine Chapels, www.levinechapels.com. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: WEINSTEIN--Sidney Moses. Age 99, chemist and Jewish community leader, passed away Monday, July 18, at his home in Brookline, MA formerly of West Orange, NJ. Services by Levine Chapels, www.levinechapels.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WEINSTEIN, SIDNEY MOSES
